name: 清心咒
author: 将门狮子吼
lyric:
[ti:心经]
[ar:黄慧音]
[00:05.375]Prajnaparamita Hridaya Sutra
[00:53.57]Arya-Avalokiteshvaro Bodhisattvo,
[00:58.912]gambhiram prajnaparamitacharyam charamano vyavalokayati,
[01:08.475]sma pancha-skandhas tams cha sva bhava shunyam
[01:14.224]pasyati sma.
[01:15.675]Iha Sariputra:
[01:17.683]Rupam shunyata,
[01:19.574]shunyataiva rupam.
[01:23.483]Rupan na prithak shunyata,
[01:26.321]shunyataya na prithag rupam.
[01:30.721]Yad rupam sa shunyata,
[01:33.419]ya shunyata sa rupam.
[01:37.400]Evam eva
[01:39.04]vedana,samjna,samskara,
[01:41.967]vijnanam.
[01:44.742]Iha Sariputra:
[01:46.753]Sarva dharmah shunyata-laksana,
[01:51.522]Anutpanna aniruddha,
[01:55.76]amala aviamala,
[01:57.148]anuna aparipurnah.
[02:00.911]Tasmaj Chariputra:
[02:02.723]Shunyatayam na rupam,
[02:05.783]na vedana,na samjna,na samskarah,
[02:10.902]na vijnanam.
[02:13.929]Na chaksuh,shrotra,ghrana
[02:16.641]jihva,kaya,manamsi;
[02:19.464]Na rupa,shabda,gandha,
[02:21.965]rasa,sprastavaya dharmah,
[02:25.231]Na chaksur-dhatur
[02:26.985]yavan na manovjnana-dhatuh.
[02:30.716]Na avidya,
[02:32.493]na avidya-kshayo,
[02:35.700]yavan na jara-maranam,
[02:38.421]na jara-marana-kshayo.
[02:41.114]Na duhkha,samudaya,
[02:43.75]nirodha,marga.
[02:45.878]Na jnanam,
[02:47.140]na praptir,na apraptih.
[02:49.974]Tasmaj Chariputra:
[02:53.237]Apraptitvad bodhisattvasya,
[02:54.790]prajnaparamitam asritya,
[02:56.544]viharaty achittavaranah.
[02:59.370]Chittavarana-nastitvad atrastro,
[03:03.891]viparyasa atikranto,
[03:07.448]nishtha nirvana praptah.
[03:11.550]Tryadhva vyavasthitah,
[03:13.887]sarva buddhah,
[03:14.944]prajnaparamitam asritya anuttaram
[03:18.254]samyaksambodhim abhisambuddhah.
[03:24.557]Tasmaj jnatavyam:
[03:28.165]Prajnaparamita maha-mantro,
[03:32.41]maha-vidya-mantro,
[03:34.665]anuttara-mantro,
[03:38.547]samasama-mantrah,
[03:44.512]sarva duhkha prasamanah,
[03:45.765]satyam amithyatvat.
[03:47.71]Prajnaparamitayam ukto mantrah.
[03:49.930]Tadyatha:
[03:50.736]Gate,gate
[03:53.45]Para gate
[03:53.453]Para sam gate
[03:54.430]Bodhi,svaha!

cmts.txt: 一代，少室山入口，少室山壁洞穴，少室百八佛小弯，少室百八佛大弯，少室百八佛看台，少室百八佛步道，少室百八佛终点，地图宏大；二代直接简化成一个图，少林寺临空步道[大哭][大哭]
cmts.author: TS周亲亲

cmts.author: 塔吉克族总经理

cmts.txt: 一个老人躺在病床上，他身边围着那些熟悉的脸庞，那是他的儿孙们。午后的阳光洒进房间，柔和的微风和那温暖的光芒，一度使老人的记忆回溯到自己的少年时代，那只干枯的手曾经抚摸过他稚嫩的脸，那些叮嘱的话语仿佛昨日。一行清泪划过他早已衰竭的眼眶，他用尽最后的力气叹到：爷爷，我也没等到风7。
cmts.author: 阿峰728

album: 風色幻想5~赤月戰爭~ Original Soundtrack
name: 神造之神
author: 将门狮子吼

cmts.txt:
直到今天……你們人類依然努力……
努力的以為自己可以超越宿命……可以跳脫神的悲憫……
努力的認為……瑟莉絲與依協莉絲的犧牲……都僅是宗教的神話……
以萬物之靈自居的你們……真的狂妄的以為你們已是這綠之星的頂點……？
既是這樣……那，我就將埃爾汀賜給你們吧……
cmts.author: Frederic_P

cmts.txt:
千年之前，瑟莉絲與依協莉絲在黑與白、赤與藍的意識指引下，繼承了洗滌大地的宿命……
那時候，瑟莉絲的親哥哥……依札克，為了拯救即將被毀滅的世界……起而對抗他唯一的親人，也就是他的摯愛……
cmts.author: Frederic_P

cmts.txt:
你們人類的努力，成就了現在的安和……
你們人類的努力，使得熒石科技未被完全消弭……
你們人類的努力，讓瑟莉絲與依協莉絲明白了愛與悲……脫離了黑與白、赤與藍的遠大意識……
cmts.author: Frederic_P

cmts.txt: 赫尔梅斯之核……当年哭着把它打爆的时候真是五味杂陈。不可多得的好游戏，无论剧情、人设、音乐、作画、系统
cmts.author: LisianthusAroma

cmts.txt:
神之威嚴、是不可侵犯的……神之智慧、是不可碰觸的……
登上了巴比倫之塔的世界之王啊，儘管任你將手中的最後磚瓦，置入你最得意的塔上，完成你最天真的夢吧……
在這一剎那，你將深刻的瞭解，自己的無知幼稚與傲慢無禮，將帶來無所妥協的……
毀滅與新生。
cmts.author: Frederic_P

cmts.txt: 刘副经理回答：风色幻想为公司、同时也是个人重要的一款作品，写了八代剧本的人是不可能不会推出风7的，但正因为此IP过于重要，再加上目前市场混沌，公司无法进行投入开发 但承诺风色幻想7一定会推出。 然而还是遥遥无7 简直有毒
cmts.author: 七夜鸣仙

name: 四海一家
author: 将门狮子吼
lyric:
[ti:WE are the world]
[ar:MJ、麦克]
[00:26.661]There comes a time when we hear a certain call
[00:32.851]When the world must 1）come together as one
[00:38.905]There are people dying
[00:42.279]And its time to 2）lend a hand to life
[00:47.673]The greatest gift of all
[00:52.971]We can't go on pretending day by day
[00:59.223]That someone,somewhere will soon 3）make a change
[01:05.857]We are all a part of God's great big family
[01:12.409]And the truth,you know
[01:14.577]Love is all we need
[01:18.559]We are the world,4）we are the children
[01:25.31]We are the ones who make a brighter day
[01:28.205]So let's start giving
[01:31.939]There's a choice we're making
[01:35.569]We're saving our own lives
[01:38.894]It's true we'll make a better day
[01:42.16]Just you and me
[01:49.178]Send them your heart
[01:52.102]So they'll know that someone cares
[01:55.383]And their lives will be stronger and free
[02:01.882]As God has shown us by 5）turning stones to bread
[02:08.690]So we all must lend a helping hand
[02:14.692]We are the world,we are the children
[02:21.204]We are the ones who make a brighter day
[02:24.481]So let's start giving
[02:28.165]There's a choice we're making
[02:31.797]We're saving our own lives
[02:35.175]It's true we'll make a better day
[02:37.955]Just you and me
[02:41.141]When you're 6）down and out
[02:43.812]There seems no hope at all
[02:48.411]But if you just believe
[02:50.277]There's no way we can fall
[02:54.613]Let us realize that a change can only come
[03:01.675]When we stand together as one
[03:07.677]We are the world,we are the children
[03:14.276]We are the ones who make a brighter day
[03:17.708]So let's start giving
[03:21.136]There's a choice we're making
[03:24.822]We're saving our own lives
[03:28.48]It's true we'll make a better day
[03:31.176]Just you and me
